site.description: To install these features, point Eclipse at this site.

category-def.name: eef.sdk
category-def.label: EEF SDK
category-def.description: EEF SDK package. It contains runtime, metamodels, generators, documentation and extended capabilities (with source).

category-def.name: eef.features
category-def.label: EEF Common
category-def.description: Contains all necessary features for EEF : EEF runtime, EEF metamodels, EEF generators and EEF documentation.

category-def.name: eef.integration
category-def.label: EEF Integration
category-def.description: EEF integration for specific cases, like UML2.
